item.content:encoded:
Simple Photo Sympathy Funeral Memorial Prayer Card

Hot Deals! Simple Photo Sympathy Funeral Memorial Prayer Card – Sympathy Cards This item is trending! Simple Photo Sympathy Funeral Memorial Prayer Card It’s a great choice Simple Photo Sympathy Funeral Memorial Prayer Card It’s in stock and ready to ship.This memorial poem card can be given as a keepsake at a Celebration of Life or funeral service or sent as a special tribute to those who were unable to attend. This card can be personalized with a favorite photo and your choice of prayer or poem. The photograph is for illustrative purposes and can be changed to one of your own. The verse says "O gentle bees, I have come to say
That grandfather fell to sleep to-day.
And we know by the smile on grandfather’s face.
He has found his dear one’s biding place.
So, bees, sing soft, and, bees, sing low.
As over the honey-fields you sweep,—
To the trees a-bloom and the flowers a-blow
Sing of grandfather fast asleep;
And ever beneath these orchard trees
Find cheer and shelter, gentle bees."
You can change it to another verse, poem or prayer if you wish. Price:$28.05
